snippet: Mr. Wilson helped lead a new generation of jazz artists in Britain, performing as a kind of cultural attaché from New Orleans.
abstract: Abram Wilson, an acclaimed American jazz trumpeter and composer from New Orleans who helped lead a new generation of jazz artists in Britain, dies at age 38.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wilson helped lead a new generation of jazz artists in Britain, performing as a kind of cultural attaché from New Orleans.

headline.seo: Abram Wilson, Jazz Trumpeter and Composer, Is Dead at 38
headline.main: Abram Wilson, Jazz Trumpeter, Dies at 38
